comments:
Driver : Eclipse 3.1 M6, tptp I200504271238
JVM : IBM 1.4.2SR1a
Platform : WindowsXP Japanese sp2

steps (test case for Log view 2)
1. import apache access log
2. open it and check the time stamp
3. change Time format to LONG or FULL at Preferences > Profiling and Logging > 
Log view
